histogram.name: MachineLearningService.CpuUsageMilliPercent
histogram.summary: Fraction of total CPU resources used by ChromeOS ML Service, sampled every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.DocumentScanner.{RequestName}.Event
histogram.summary: The result of DocumentScanner.{RequestName} request, which can be OK or ERROR.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.GrammarChecker.Check.Event
histogram.summary: The result of grammar check, which can be OK or ERROR.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.HandwritingModel.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of load handwriting model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chrome or in chromeos when handwriting model is not loaded successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.HandwritingModel.Recognize.Event
histogram.summary: The result of handwriting recognition, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.HeatmapPalmRejection.ExecuteResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of heatmap palm rejection Execute request, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.HeatmapPalmRejection.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of load heatmap palm rejection module, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.LoadModelResult
histogram.summary: The error result of LoadModel in cases when the model name could not be determined. See MachineLearningService.*.LoadModelResult.Event for the result broken down by model name when the name is known.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MlCore.DlcBeginInstallDlcServiceError
histogram.summary: The detailed error code received from DLC Service while trying to request to install the ML Core DLC.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MlCore.DlcBeginInstallResult
histogram.summary: Result of an attempt to request DLC Service to begin installation of the ML Core DLC. See the related histogram .DlcBeginInstallDlcServiceError for detailed error codes returned from DLC Service.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MlCore.DlcFinalInstallDlcServiceError
histogram.summary: The detailed error code received from DLC Service after a DLC State Change notification from DLC Service, following a request to install the ML Core DLC. "BUSY" code is considered non-final as retries are made in this case.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MlCore.DlcFinalInstallResult
histogram.summary: Final result of an attempt to install the ML Core DLC. See the related histogram .DlcFinalInstallDlcServiceError for detailed error codes returned from DLC Service.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MlCore.DlcInstallAttemptCount
histogram.summary: Indicates at least n attempts were made to install the ML Core DLC. Note that the buckets are cumulative: If e.g. 3 attempts are made, then the "1", "2", and "3" buckets will all be incremented.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.MojoConnectionEvent
histogram.summary: Events related to the connection and disconnection of the Mojo IPC channel between Chrome and the ChromeOS ML Service.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.NumWorkerProcess
histogram.summary: Number of worker processes registered in ml-service. Only used in ChromeOS. Sampled every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.PeakTotalMemoryKb
histogram.summary: Peak total (shared and non-shared) memory used by ChromeOS ML Service over the last 24 hours. Sampled every 5 minutes, so may miss short-lived spikes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.ProcessError
histogram.summary: Process handling errors of ml-service. Emitted when there is error in process handling. For example, "failed to spawning worker process" etc. Only used in ChromeOS.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.ReapWorkerProcessErrno
histogram.summary: The "errno" of waitpid calls used by ml-service's control process to reap the worker processes. This is only recorded when waitpid meets error and should be rare. This is a ChromeOS only metric. And we only record the corresponding enum values of "ECHILD", "EINTR" and "EINVAL" because according to the man page of waitpid, they are the only possible errno. All the other "errno" are treated as "unknown" error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.TextSuggester.Suggest.Event
histogram.summary: The result of a text suggester request, which can be OK or ERROR.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.TotalMemoryKb
histogram.summary: Total (shared and non-shared) memory used by ChromeOS ML Service, sampled every 5 minutes.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformHandwritingModel.GetPrediction.Event
histogram.summary: The result of Web platform handwriting recognition, which can be either OK or Error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformHandwritingModel.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of load web platform handwriting model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chrome or in chromeos when handwriting model is not loaded successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformTfLiteFlatBufferModel.Compute.Event
histogram.summary: The result of compute/inference based on a web platform model loaded, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chromeos when the computation fails.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformTfLiteFlatBufferModel.CreateModelLoaderResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of creating web platform model loader, which can be success or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chromeos when the model loader can not be created successfully.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WebPlatformTfLiteFlatBufferModel.Load.Event
histogram.summary: The result of loading a web platform model, which can be OK or some specific error. The error code could be logged in machine learning service in chromeos when model can not successfully loaded.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WorkerProcessAcceptMojoConnectionTime
histogram.summary: The wall time used for the worker process to accept the mojo connection to control process in ml-service. Only used in ChromeOS.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WorkerProcessCleanUpTime
histogram.summary: The wall time used by the control process to reap and cleanup the worker processes in ml-service. Only used in ChromeOS.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.WorkerProcessExitStatus
histogram.summary: The exit status of the worker processes of ml-service. Only used in Chrome OS. This is only emitted when the worker process exits with non-zero status. And theoretically, there can be 255 different types of status (from 1 to 255).

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ModelName}.CreateGraphExecutorResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of CreateGraphExecutor request for model {ModelName}, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ModelName}.ExecuteResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of Execute request for model {ModelName}, which can be OK or some specific error.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{ModelName}.LoadModelResult.Event
histogram.summary: The result of LoadModel request for model {ModelName}, which can be OK or some specific error. Additional error information may be found in Chrome logs or ml_service logs within ChromeOS logs.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.CpuTimeMicrosec
histogram.summary: CPU time (for one CPU core) of {RequestName} request. Reported for all users; users without high-resolution clocks will report 0 for short requests.

histogram.name: MachineLearningService.{RequestName}.TotalMemoryDeltaKb
histogram.summary: Memory usage increase caused by {RequestName} request.
